title: Prime Minister Dhan-Dhaanya Krishi Yojana
description: Aims to develop agricultural districts by enhancing infrastructure, providing financial support to farmers, and promoting sustainable farming practices.

title: Rural Prosperity and Resilience Programme
description: Focuses on building rural infrastructure, improving connectivity, and enhancing the quality of life in rural areas.

title: Mission for Aatmanirbharta in Pulses
description: Seeks to achieve self-sufficiency in pulse production through support to farmers and research initiatives.

title: Comprehensive Programme for Vegetables & Fruits
description: Aims to boost the production and export of vegetables and fruits by providing financial incentives and infrastructure support.

title: National Mission on High Yielding Seeds
description: Focuses on the development and distribution of high-yielding seed varieties to enhance crop productivity.

title: Fisheries Mission for Cotton Productivity
description: Aims to improve cotton productivity through modern farming techniques and support to cotton farmers.

title: Enhanced Credit through Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Provides increased credit limits to farmers for meeting their agricultural and ancillary needs.

title: Urea Plant in Assam
description: Establishes a new urea manufacturing plant in Assam to meet the fertilizer needs of the northeastern region.

title: Revision in Classification Criteria for MSMEs
description: Updates the classification criteria for Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises to provide better support and incentives.

title: Credit Cards for Micro Enterprises
description: Introduces credit card facilities for micro-enterprises to ease access to credit and promote entrepreneurship.

title: Fund of Funds for Startups
description: Establishes a fund to support startups with capital and resources to foster innovation and entrepreneurship.

title: Scheme for First-time Entrepreneurs
description: Provides support and mentorship to first-time entrepreneurs to encourage new business ventures.

title: Focus Product Scheme for Footwear & Leather Sectors
description: Offers incentives to boost production and export in the footwear and leather sectors.

title: Support for Food Processing
description: Provides financial and infrastructural support to the food processing industry to enhance value addition and exports.

title: Manufacturing Mission - Furthering 'Make in India'
description: Promotes domestic manufacturing through incentives and policy support under the 'Make in India' initiative.

title: Saksham Anganwadi and Poshan 2.0
description: Aims to improve child and maternal health through strengthened Anganwadi services and nutrition programs.

title: Atal Tinkering Labs
description: Establishes labs in schools to foster innovation and creativity among students.

title: Broadband Connectivity to Government Secondary Schools and PHCs
description: Provides high-speed internet connectivity to government secondary schools and primary health centers to enhance education and healthcare services.

title: Bharatiya Bhasha Pustak Scheme
description: Promotes the publication of books in Indian languages to preserve and promote linguistic diversity.

title: National Centres of Excellence for Skilling
description: Establishes centers of excellence to provide advanced skill training in various sectors.
